target.rawSql:
SELECT
	'All Time High: ' || btc_price_usd AS title,
	"time"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
	btc_price_usd DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
	'All Time Low: ' || btc_price_usd AS title,
	"time"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
	btc_price_usd ASC
LIMIT 1;

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	time_bucket ('${tb_width}',
		"time") AS bucket_time,
	(avg(eur_on_kraken) + avg(eur_in_wallet)) / avg(total_cache_to_kraken) * 100 - 100 AS "Profil 60m"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
	bucket_time
ORDER BY
	bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  avg(total_cache_to_kraken) AS "Total Invest"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC

SELECT
	time_bucket ('${tb_width}',
		"time") AS bucket_time,
	(avg(eur_on_kraken) + avg(eur_in_wallet)) AS "Total Value"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
	bucket_time
ORDER BY
	bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  AVG(btc_price_usd) AS "1 Day"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) AS btc FROM purchases WHERE time < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year';

SELECT
	TO_CHAR(AGE(LAST ("next_dca_order_time", "time"), NOW()), 'DD"d" HH24h MI') || 'm' AS last
FROM
	investment_exporter

SELECT
	time_bucket ('${tb_width}',
		"time") AS bucket_time,
	(avg(eur_on_kraken) + avg(eur_in_wallet)) - avg(total_cache_to_kraken) AS "Profit"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
	bucket_time
ORDER BY
	bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  avg(eur_in_wallet) + avg(eur_on_kraken) AS "Total Portfolio"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  avg(total_cache_to_kraken) AS "Total Investment"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC
SELECT last("eur_in_wallet", "time") AS "Euro in Wallet" FROM investment_exporter
SELECT last("eur_on_kraken", "time") AS "Euro on Kraken" FROM investment_exporter

SELECT
	time_bucket ('1 month',
		"time") AS bucket_time,
	TO_CHAR(time_bucket ('1 month', "time"), 'Month') ||EXTRACT('Year' FROM time_bucket ('1 month', "time")) AS "Date",
	(avg(eur_on_kraken) + avg(eur_in_wallet)) / avg(total_cache_to_kraken) * 100 - 100 AS "Change",
	(min(eur_on_kraken) + min(eur_in_wallet)) / min(total_cache_to_kraken) * 100 - 100 AS "Min Change",
	(max(eur_on_kraken) + max(eur_in_wallet)) / max(total_cache_to_kraken) * 100 - 100 AS "Max Change"
FROM
	investment_exporter
GROUP BY
	bucket_time
ORDER BY
	bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  AVG(btc_price_usd) AS "Bitcoin price"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC

SELECT
	time_bucket ('12 hours',
		"time") AS bucket_time,
    AVG(btc_price_usd) AS "Bitcoin price"
FROM
	investment_exporter
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
	bucket_time
ORDER BY
	bucket_time DESC

SELECT
  hypertable_name AS "Hypertable Name",
  pg_size_pretty(
    hypertable_approximate_size (
      format('%I.%I', hypertable_schema, hypertable_name) :: regclass
    )
  ) AS "Table Size",
  approximate_row_count (hypertable_name :: TEXT) AS "Row Count",
  num_chunks AS "Chunk Count",
  compression_enabled AS "Compression Enabled"
FROM
  timescaledb_information.hypertables

SELECT
  time_bucket ('${tb_width}', "time") AS bucket_time,
  AVG(total_scrape_time) AS "Total Scrape Time"
FROM
  investment_exporter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY
  bucket_time
ORDER BY
  bucket_time DESC

list.label: Time Bucket Width
list.name: tb_width
list.query: 1 second, 1 minute, 10 minutes, 1 hour, 12 hours, 1 day,
